definition: to settle down/to set up a home
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make one's home in a place/to settle
stable household, established profession (idiom); settled and comfortably off

sentences.chinese: 你能在這裏安家落戶嗎？

sentences.english: Thousands of militants traded in guns for stipends and training.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬的武裝分子開始接受培訓並領取安家費。

sentences.english: Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 於國外，現在沙畫在中國安家落戶。

sentences.english: Provide an apartment and family allowance during the period of working.
sentences.chinese: 工作期間提供公寓式住房一套和安家費。
他們已經在海南島安家落戶。

sentences.english: A house in filial piety is Lord of as vice President, in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 在孝是安家的一家之主，在小學擔任副校長。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage veteran cadres to settle in the countryside or in small or medium-sized cities or towns.
sentences.chinese: 國家鼓勵離休幹部到農村或中小城鎮安家落戶。

sentences.english: Do I have to transfer my settlement funds to New Zealand?
sentences.chinese: 我必須把我的安家費轉移到新西蘭嗎？

sentences.english: He has determined to settle down in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他決定在農村安家落戶。

sentences.english: We are focused on providing the expatriate community with the highest standards of relocation service.
sentences.chinese: 志盟置業是專爲青島的外籍人士提供專業的安家服務。

sentences.english: Our men some of them-might even settle here.
sentences.chinese: 我們之中有幾個人很想在這裏安家。

sentences.english: All the families got the settling-in allowance from the government.
sentences.chinese: 所有家庭都得到了政府的安家費。

sentences.english: Sparrow, build your home in the belly of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀啊，在野獸的腹中安家吧。

sentences.english: This wife brought two daughters into the house with her.
sentences.chinese: 新妻子帶着她以前生的兩個女兒一起來安家了。

sentences.english: We'll go and settle down where conditions are hardest.
Does the idea of making a home in a foreign destination sound crazy? Or awesome?
sentences.chinese: 在一個陌生的地方再次安家，是瘋狂還是酷斃了？
